content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need HVAC service. May I have your name to get started?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're available in your area?
I live at 123 Maple Drive, Springfield.
Thank you, Emily. Great news — we do service your area. What time would be ideal for you to have a technician come out?
I’m actually holding off on scheduling anything for now. I’m waiting to see if my insurance will cover the HVAC repairs first.
I understand, Emily. It makes sense to wait for insurance confirmation before scheduling. If you’d like, I can reach out to you later to check in?
Thanks, but I’d rather contact you when I’m ready. I appreciate your help!
reason: Customer waiting on insurance coverage before scheduling
